Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into three registers: 1 - Wedjat-eyes. 2 - Seated figure before an offering-table; standing figure to the right. 3 - Central offering-table flanked by two kneeling female figures. Rows and columns of Hieroglyphic text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1913 / Catalogue of Egyptian scarabs, etc. in the British Museum (pl.41)
Acquisition name: Donated through: Dr Henry Bence Jones
